SourceText: 佢老公走咗之後屋企收入大減。為咗俾個仔繼續學小提琴，佢唯有打兩份工揾多啲錢。
TargetText: Her family's income dropped sharply after her husband left. In order for her son to continue learning violin, she had to work two jobs to earn more money.

SourceText: 花王好用心打理學校個天台花園，班學生小息都好鍾意上嚟坐。
TargetText: The gardener takes good care of the rooftop garden of the school. The students like coming up here to sit around during recess.

SourceText: 返工返到得返半條人命，搞到自己身體噉樣，賺埋都唔夠你睇醫生啦。
TargetText: Your day job is so exhausting that you are like half-dead after work. If you keep pushing yourself like this, the money you earn won't even cover your medical bills.
